title: Dwyane Wade, Ja'Net DuBois, LBJ, Boy Scouts of America and more.
itunes:title: Dwyane Wade, Ja'Net DuBois, LBJ, Boy Scouts of America and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are here to entertain and motivate you. Our mission is to help you find the real you inside of you. Let's go! The crew discuss who they want as the leader of the Democratic Race. There are some controversial details that have arisen surrounding the death of James Brown. Dwyane Wade has mentioned the difficulty of going public with his child's gender identity. Ja'Net Dubois the actress from Good Times passed away peacefully in her sleep. Uncle Steve has a number for you to call that will get you a $200 discount for Sand and Soul. Lebron James has been named the Associated Press male athlete of the decade. The Boy Scouts of America are facing bankruptcy and more amid piling sexual abuse allegations. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about parenting and what challenges parents today face, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
